name: Morphing Mirror Force
description:
This game is made using OpenGL, which makes it significantly more work to code it up compared to using an established game engine, but I think both the process of making it and the final product are fun. Hope you find this game interesting as well.

2 players will face each other in a best-of-3 format in this game. In each stage the objects will respond differently to collisons and reflect lasers in a different manner. Try it out yourself and find out the best strategy for each stage.

Controls:

Red Player: WASD to move, JK to rotate, space to shoot.
Blue Player: arrow keys to move, 78to rotate, 0 to shoot.
All number keys are numpad keys. All movements are relative to the spaceship.
